title: Cable-Ready 1BR/1BA Apartment with Controlled Access! MOVE IN SPECIAL
posting_body: ['Get $1000 off your first month rent when you lease with in 48 hours of your tour at Clayton Gardens.', 'Live with beauty and serenity', 'Medium 1 Bed 1 Bath  1 \xa0bed / 1 bath / 600 Sq.', 'Ft / $2,314 - $2,567  * Unit 220 - Available Now', '* Unit 214 - Available', 'Now', '* Unit 108 - Available', 'Now', 'Clayton Gardens', 'Address:', '4220 Clayton Rd Concord, CA 94521', 'Call Us Today!', 'show contact info', 'x134', 'Property Description', 'Suburban Concord has this one-bedroom, one-bathroom apartment available at Clayton Gardens today!', 'It has great features like a personal patio where you can relax after a long day and enjoy the city views.', 'You also get to have a walk-in pantry, large enough to store more than just food, but other goods and equipment as well.', 'Air conditioning and ceiling fans are provided, so you live in comfortable temperatures.', 'A dishwasher is equipped in the kitchen for maximum convenience.', 'This home is also cable-ready, so you just have to ask the staff for more information.', 'Clayton Gardens provides its residents with great amenities, including elevators, covered parking, and wheelchair access.', 'Pets are also welcome with certain breed restrictions.', 'Call now to learn more about this offer!', 'Property Amenities', '* Fitness Center', '* Clubhouse', '* Carport and Garage parking', '* Cable Ready', '* Air Conditioning', '* Laundry Facility', '* Controlled Access', 'Parking:', 'Type', '- Other', 'Please contact our office for parking details.', 'Pet Policy:', 'Cat, Dog s are allowed.', 'We accept 2 pets per apartment home.', 'Pet fees range from $55 to $80 per pet.', 'There is a weight limit of 50 lbs.', 'Please contact our leasing office for pet policies and breed restrictions.', 'Office Hours', 'Tuesday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Wednesday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Thursday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Friday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Saturday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Management Company:', 'GK MANAGEMENT CO INC**', 'Call Us Today!', 'show contact info', 'x134', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
